definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: Encourage South Korea ball exercises, collision Chinese fishing boats.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励南韩实弹演习，冲撞中国渔船。

sentences.english: The case of Korean scientist Hwang Woo Suk offers one powerful example.
sentences.chinese: 案例之一，南韩科学家，黄禹锡是一个强有力的例子。

sentences.english: On June twenty-fifth, nineteen fifty, forces from North Korea invaded South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 1950年，六月二十五号，北韩入侵南韩。

sentences.english: It is also mentioned in South Korea's national anthem.
sentences.chinese: 南韩的国歌中也提到了白头山。

sentences.english: South Korea is now expected to stage the military drills Monday or Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 南韩预期在星期一和星期二上演军事训练。

sentences.english: Each pair represents one South Korean province.
sentences.chinese: 每一对都代表了南韩的一个省。

sentences.english: It was even blasted into space with the country's first astronaut in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 泡菜也与2008年跟着南韩第一位太空人上太空。

sentences.english: South Korea's Samsung Electronics has been on a hiring tear.
sentences.chinese: 南韩的三星电子正在做一个雇用上的抉择。

sentences.english: This is one of the least evangelized areas of South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 这是南韩境内其中一个福音最少被传扬的地区。

sentences.english: South Korea’s government has asked that Japan’s refrain from referring to the Takeshima question.
sentences.chinese: 南韩政府已要求日本政府提及竹岛问题时，保持克制。

sentences.english: Korean TV did something similar recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近南韩电事台做了些类似的事情。

sentences.english: South Korean protester holds a picket at a rally to protest free trade agreement talks in Seoul March 9, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 南韩抗议者举牌抗议在首尔举行的自由贸易协定会谈。

sentences.english: That would be hugely costly, especially for South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 如此一来，大家要付出的代价相当沈重，尤其是南韩。

sentences.english: Next up for the team is Japan.
sentences.chinese: 南韩的下一个对手是日本队。

sentences.english: Even Korean royals from Joseon Dynasty still around, now they live among normal citizens in Japan and South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜王室还在，现在他们是日本和南韩的普通公民。

sentences.english: Jong-Bin YOON, Professor, Department of Political Science, Myong Ji University, Republic of Korea (South Korea)
sentences.chinese: 尹钟彬，汝京大学政治科学系教授，南韩。

definition: South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897
Busan Metropolitan City in South Gyeongsang Province 慶尚南道|庆尚南道[Qing4 shang4 nan2 dao4], South Korea
Gyeonggi Province, South Korea, surrounding Seoul and Incheon, capital Suweon City 水原市[Shui3 yuan2 shi4]
North Chungcheong Province, South Korea, capital Cheongju 清州市
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
North Jeolla Province, in west South Korea, capital Jeonju 全州[Quan2 zhou1]
South Chungcheong Province, South Korea, capital Daejeon 大田[Da4 tian2]
Busan Metropolitan City in South Gyeongsang Province 慶尚南道|庆尚南道[Qing4 shang4 nan2 dao4], South Korea
Chosun Ilbo, a South Korean newspaper
